name: Anxiety (itch) (ShaneBrimson)
description:
Anyone having issues playing my game here a version to you can play via clicking on this link - https://www.sharemygame.com/share/c4455445-787c-48cd-ab75-79847f38b763

Go on a walk with Anxiety.

Collect Orbs To Score Points.

Use Arrow Keys To Move Character, Space To Jump And Esc For Pause Menu.

Can you reach the warm light of the Street lamp which marks the end of the level?

(hey guys this is my first ever game jam entry, please be kind :) also I am a single person team and wanted to see if I could make a game in a week to test myself and technically I did so im proud of myself and that makes me happy.

 my idea was to have a bad level with "scary things" and a good level with "normal things", using the same level layout but with different objects.  a good day with anxiety vs a bad day. sadly I massively misjudged my time management and was unable to finish my idea. I spent way to long making menus work. atleast I know for next time. 

enjoy my game)
